languages.text: {n}Шутили ли вы или были серьезны, оба аколита Золотого трона пропустили ваши слова мимо ушей: ослабленная биомантией Эмелина сверлит взглядом Хейнрикса, который, кажется, напряженно о чем-то думает.{/n}

{n}Whether you were joking or being deadly serious, your words fall on the deaf ears of the two acolytes of the Golden Throne: Emelina, weakened by biomancy, is staring fixedly at Heinrix, who seems to be engrossed in intense rumination.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Шутили ли вы или были серьезны, оба аколита Золотого трона пропустили ваши слова мимо ушей: ослабленная биомантией Эмелина сверлит взглядом Хейнрикса, который, кажется, напряженно о чем-то думает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Whether you were joking or being deadly serious, your words fall on the deaf ears of the two acolytes of the Golden Throne: Emelina, weakened by biomancy, is staring fixedly at Heinrix, who seems to be engrossed in intense rumination.{/n}

{n}Whether you were joking or being deadly serious, your words fall on the deaf ears of the two acolytes of the Golden Throne: Emelina, weakened by biomancy, is staring fixedly at Heinrix, who seems to be engrossed in intense rumination.{/n}

{n}Whether you were joking or being deadly serious, your words fall on the deaf ears of the two acolytes of the Golden Throne: Emelina, weakened by biomancy, is staring fixedly at Heinrix, who seems to be engrossed in intense rumination.{/n}

{n}Whether you were joking or being deadly serious, your words fall on the deaf ears of the two acolytes of the Golden Throne: Emelina, weakened by biomancy, is staring fixedly at Heinrix, who seems to be engrossed in intense rumination.{/n}

languages.text: {n}虽然不知道你是在开玩笑，还是认真地说出这句话，但黄金王座的两位侍仆都对你的话充耳不闻。艾米莉娜被生物法术削弱了力量，正死死地盯着海因里希，而海因里希似乎正沉浸在紧张的沉思中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Whether you were joking or being deadly serious, your words fall on the deaf ears of the two acolytes of the Golden Throne: Emelina, weakened by biomancy, is staring fixedly at Heinrix, who seems to be engrossed in intense rumination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}虽然不知道你是在开玩笑，还是认真地说出这句话，但黄金王座的两位侍仆都对你的话充耳不闻。艾米莉娜被生物法术削弱了力量，正死死地盯着海因里希，而海因里希似乎正沉浸在紧张的沉思中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lo hubieras dicho en broma o con total seriedad, ambos acólitos del Trono Dorado ignoran tus palabras: Emelina, debilitada por la biomancia, observa sin parpadear a Heinrix, que parece sumido en una profunda reflexión.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Whether you were joking or being deadly serious, your words fall on the deaf ears of the two acolytes of the Golden Throne: Emelina, weakened by biomancy, is staring fixedly at Heinrix, who seems to be engrossed in intense rumination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lo hubieras dicho en broma o con total seriedad, ambos acólitos del Trono Dorado ignoran tus palabras: Emelina, debilitada por la biomancia, observa sin parpadear a Heinrix, que parece sumido en una profunda reflexión.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたがふざけているにしても、ひどく真剣であるにしても、あなたの言葉は黄金の玉座の2人のアコライトの耳には届かない。生体秘法で衰弱したエメリナは、過度の反芻に夢中になっているように見えるハインリックスをじっと見つめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Whether you were joking or being deadly serious, your words fall on the deaf ears of the two acolytes of the Golden Throne: Emelina, weakened by biomancy, is staring fixedly at Heinrix, who seems to be engrossed in intense rumination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたがふざけているにしても、ひどく真剣であるにしても、あなたの言葉は黄金の玉座の2人のアコライトの耳には届かない。生体秘法で衰弱したエメリナは、過度の反芻に夢中になっているように見えるハインリックスをじっと見つめる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Que vous plaisantiez ou non, les deux acolytes du Trône d'Or ne vous prêtent pas attention. Emelina, affaiblie par la biomancie, regarde fixement Heinrix, qui semble plongé dans une profonde réflexion.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Whether you were joking or being deadly serious, your words fall on the deaf ears of the two acolytes of the Golden Throne: Emelina, weakened by biomancy, is staring fixedly at Heinrix, who seems to be engrossed in intense rumination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Que vous plaisantiez ou non, les deux acolytes du Trône d'Or ne vous prêtent pas attention. Emelina, affaiblie par la biomancie, regarde fixement Heinrix, qui semble plongé dans une profonde réflexion.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ganz gleich, ob das ein Scherz oder völlig ernst gemeint war, deine Wort stoßen bei den beiden Akolythen des Goldenen Throns auf taube Ohren: Emelina, durch Biomantie geschwächt, starrt unverwandt Heinrix an, der anscheinend intensiv nachdenkt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Whether you were joking or being deadly serious, your words fall on the deaf ears of the two acolytes of the Golden Throne: Emelina, weakened by biomancy, is staring fixedly at Heinrix, who seems to be engrossed in intense rumination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ganz gleich, ob das ein Scherz oder völlig ernst gemeint war, deine Wort stoßen bei den beiden Akolythen des Goldenen Throns auf taube Ohren: Emelina, durch Biomantie geschwächt, starrt unverwandt Heinrix an, der anscheinend intensiv nachdenkt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ciddi olman veya şaka amaçlı böyle konuşman fark etmeksizin sözcüklerin, Altın Taht'ın iki havarisinin bir kulağından girip öbüründen çıkıyor. Biyobazlığın zayıf düşürdüğü Emelina, derin düşüncelere dalmış gibi gözüken Heinrix'e odaklanmış durumda.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Whether you were joking or being deadly serious, your words fall on the deaf ears of the two acolytes of the Golden Throne: Emelina, weakened by biomancy, is staring fixedly at Heinrix, who seems to be engrossed in intense rumination.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Şaka da yapıyor olsan, son derece ciddi de konuşuyor olsan, sözcüklerin Altın Taht'ın iki havarisinin bir kulağından giriyor, diğerinden çıkıyor. Biyobazlık ile zayıf düşmüş Emelina, derin düşüncelere dalmış gibi gözüken Heinrix'e odaklanmış durumda.{/n}
